titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Boxwood Garden Club Records, 1937-2007, 2012
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 43899
titlepage.author: Trenton Hizer

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Boxwood Garden Club records, 1937-2007, 2012. Accession 43899. Organization records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Susan Overton, Richmond, Virginia

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Boxwood Garden Club was founded in 1937 in Richmond, Virginia. The club is a member club in the Garden Club of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1937-2007, 2012, of the Boxwood Garden Club of Richmond, Virginia, containing meeting minutes, attendance records, yearbooks, financial reports, bank records, by-laws, programs, registers, photographs, slides, clippings, articles, magazines, and other materials concerning the Boxwood Garden Club's activities, programs, community service, and projects, as well as its role as a member of the Garden Club of Virginia. Collection is organized into the following series: Series I: Minutes, 1945-2205. Series II: Organization Reports and Records, 1937-2003. Series III: Yearbooks, 1979-2007. Series IV: Tablescapes and Tablescapes II, 1985-1987. Series V: Garden Club of Virginia, 1979-2002. Series VI: Miscellaneous. Series VII: Scrapbooks, 1937-2005.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series II: Organization Reports and Records, 1937-2003, 2012.
Series IV: Tablescapes and Tablescapes II, 1985-1987.
Series V: Garden Club of Virginia, 1979-2002.

scopecontent.p: Minutes, 1945-2005 contains minutes for monthly meetings, executive meetings, and annual meetings; agendas; attendance; financial reports; reports; yearbooks; and other materials detailing the activities of the Boxwood Garden Club.

did.unittitle: Minutes, 1945-1949 (includes annual and executive meeting minutes, attendance, yearbooks).
Minutes, 1949-1950 (includes annual and executive meeting minutes, attendance, yearbooks).

Minutes, 1968-1969 (includes annual and executive meeting minutes, attendance, Garden Club of Virginia annual meeting minutes).
Minutes, 1971-1975 (includes annual and executive meeting minutes, attendance).
Minutes, 1977-1979 (includes annual reports, agendas, executive meeting minutes and other papers).
Minutes, 1979-1982 (includes annual and executive meeting minutes, attendance, financial reports, and other papers).
Minutes, 1983-1985 (includes annual meeting minutes, attendance, financial reports, reports, and other papers).

Minutes, 1993-2001 (includes annual meeting minutes, histories, and other papers).
Minutes, 1995-1997 (includes agendas, reports, financial papers, and other papers).
Series II: Organization Reports and Records, 1937-2003, 2012.

scopecontent.p: Organization Reports and Records, 1937-2003, contains annual reports, bank book, bank records, by-laws, financial reports, treasurer's reports, histories, State Corporation Commission papers, and Internal Revenue Service papers for the Boxwood Garden Club.

did.unittitle: Organization papers, 1984-1985 (SCC and IRS papers, by-laws, bank papers).
Treasurer's reports and bank book, 1937-1965 (bank book, 1955-1961).

scopecontent.p: Yearbooks, 1979-2007, consisting of the yearbooks of the Boxwood Garden Club contains membership information.

did.unittitle: Series IV: Tablescapes and Tablescapes II, 1985-1987.

scopecontent.p: Tablescapes, 1985, and Tablescapes II, 1987, contains advertising, brochures, fliers, programs, reports, negatives, photographs, slides, and other papers relating to the Boxwood Garden Club programs Tablescapes and Tablescapes II.

did.unittitle: Tablescapes II, 1987, publicity report, including advertising.
Tablescapes II, 1987, brochures and pamphlets (see also box 9, folders 3-4).
Tablescapes II, 1987, miscellaneous papers and photographs.
Series V: Garden Club of Virginia, 1979-2002.

scopecontent.p: Garden Club of Virginia, 1979-2002, contains programs for annual meetings and Board of Governors meetings; member register and supplement to register, 2000-2002; materials for the Garden Club of Virginia meeting in Richmond in 1979; and programs, photographs, thank-you notes, and other materials for the Garden Club of Virginia meeting in Richmond in 1999.

scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous contains articles, art work, awards, certificates, clippings, correspondence, magazines, medals, meeting minutes, notes, photographs, postors, rosters, slides, and other materials concerning Bandy Field (Richmond, Va.), the Three Chopt Garden Club, the Tuckahoe Garden Club, the James River Garden Club, the Hampton Roads Garden Club, the Garden Club of the Middle Peninsula, flowers, Garden Club of Virginia rose shows, Gunston Hall gardens, and Garden Gossip magazine

scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks, 1937-2005, contains advertisements, awards, brochures, clippings, correspondence, fliers, guides, invitations, magazines, minutes, name tags, photographs, plans, programs, reports, telegrams, yearbooks, clippings, correspondence, awards, telegrams, yearbooks, and other materials chronicling the history of the Boxwood Garden Club.
